project.description: deploy httpd from puppet master to puppet agents

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
hostname -i mv -f /jenkins/workspace/deplyhttpd/Dockerfile /etc/puppet/modules/docker/files/ mv -f /jenkins/workspace/deplyhttpd/index.html /etc/puppet/modules/docker/files/ mv -f /jenkins/workspace/deplyhttpd/docker1.pp /etc/puppet/manifests/ mv -f /jenkins/workspace/deplyhttpd/init0.pp /etc/puppet/modules/docker/manifests
mv /etc/puppet/modules/docker/manifests/init.pp /etc/puppet/modules/docker/manifests/init.pp.bak sleep 5 mv /etc/puppet/modules/docker/manifests/init0.pp /etc/puppet/modules/docker/manifests/init.pp mv /etc/puppet/manifests/site.pp /etc/puppet/manifests/site.pp.bak sleep 5 mv /etc/puppet/manifests/docker1.pp /etc/puppet/manifests/site.pp
